description: Triciclos provides businesses with strategic consulting on profitable waste management and recycling, while educating and engaging with individuals about their household recycling habits.
Trocafone is the first end-to-end marketplace in Latin America. It allows people to buy and sell used electronic equipment without complications.

Trusting Social uses proprietary AI solutions to enable financial institutions and other organizations to accurately assess the creditworthiness of overlooked individuals and provide them with appropriate lending products.
Turismocity is an online metasearch and price comparison tool which allows travelers throughout Latin America to compare flights, hotels, cruises, rental car and travel packages.
Uatt? develops and commercializes creative gifts that reflect behavior trends, waking emotion and happiness.
Ubits is an Ed-Tech company for corporate training in LatAm, offering a catalogue of Bits(courses), consisting of short digital content taught by industry leaders for employee training.

uHoo provides a complete indoor air quality solution with its patented air sensor and SaaS platform that alerts users of air quality problems, recommends solutions, and integrates with air cleaning devices, lights, and building control systems to automate and optimize air quality management.
USN has been at the forefront of sports nutrition research, making effective sports nutrition supplements used by professional and nonprofessional athletes.
Unifa offers nurseries across Japan AI and IoT-powered solutions to digitize processes and track children’s care.
Unima is developing fast and low-cost diagnostics and infectious disease surveillance for communities with limited resources.

description: UDX is creating a cancer detection platform consisting of minimally invasive, blood-based solutions.
URBANO creates fashion accessories for the technological world.

UTURN is one of the leading digital networks of content creators in the Arabic-speaking world, connecting brands with audiences through edgy video-content. In 2018, Webedia Group approached ‘Webedia Middle East’ to form Webedia Arabia Group, where Kaswara was appointed as Chairman.
Vanessa Duran Jewelry employs a direct selling model to empower women and provide middle and lower income consumers throughout Argentina with access to quality jewelry.

Vectorform is a specialty design and technology firm that invents digital products and experiences for the world’s leading brands, with a focus on Immersive Technologies, Mobile Experiences, Internet of Things, Smart Homes, Connected Vehicles and Wearable Technologies.
Velasca is a Direct-To-Consumer brand that offers Made in Italy men’s shoes at affordable prices, from the artisan’s hands to the customer’s feet.
Vendomatica is dedicated to installing food and drink machines in public areas.
Ver De Verdad is the first low cost optical chain in Mexico, serving an unattended market of people who can’t afford prescription glasses or don’t know they need them.
VERTICAL is using experiential learning as a methodological resource to develop organizations.
Vezeeta is one of the Middle East’s largest telemedicine and doctor-booking platforms.
